greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of e.g.f.: sinh(log(1 + sin(x))).
comment: |a(n)| = number of odd alternating permutations on n letters (offset 1). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, May 20 2007
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..450
program: (PARI) x='x+O('x^30); concat([0], Vec(serlaplace(sinh(log(1+sin(x)))))) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Jan 21 2018
results.author: _R. H. Hardin_
ext: Extended with signs by _Olivier Gérard_, Mar 15 1997
